rounds.attribution: Real photograph — river flowing through forest
rounds.pro_tip: WATER REFLECTIONS: Real water creates complex, irregular reflections that shift with current and wind. AI water often looks glassy or has repetitive reflection patterns.
FUR TEXTURE: Real animal fur has inconsistent length, direction, and color. Look closely at the whiskers — each one casts its own shadow.
AERIAL PATTERNS: From above, real terrain shows fractal-like drainage patterns and irregular vegetation. AI aerials tend to repeat terrain textures too uniformly.
LIGHTING CONSISTENCY: Check if shadows all point the same direction. AI sometimes creates multiple light sources that wouldn't exist in a single real photograph.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph — person with coffee in winter
rounds.pro_tip: HAND DETAILS: Real photos show natural hand proportions, visible knuckle creases, and consistent nail shapes. AI hands often have subtle distortions.
CLOUD EDGES: Real clouds have irregular, wispy edges with varying opacity. AI clouds can look too sculpted or have unnaturally sharp boundaries.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph — garden path with flowers
rounds.pro_tip: PLANT VARIETY: Real gardens have imperfect, diverse plants — some wilting, some blooming, different heights. AI gardens tend to look uniformly perfect.
MATERIAL JOINTS: Real buildings show seams, grout lines, weathering at joints. AI architecture often has impossibly smooth transitions between materials.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph — ocean waves at sunset
rounds.pro_tip: WAVE FOAM: Real ocean foam is chaotic — thousands of tiny bubbles in irregular clusters. AI foam often looks like white paint strokes or uniform patterns.
EDGE ARTIFACTS: Zoom into where objects meet backgrounds. AI images sometimes show subtle haloing, bleeding, or unnatural sharpness at object boundaries.
